# Vectors and Matrices

## Vector Arithmetic

### Addition and Subtraction

1. Let $\mathbf{u} = \begin{bmatrix} 2 \\ 3 \end{bmatrix}$ and $\mathbf{v} = \begin{bmatrix} 4 \\ 5 \end{bmatrix}$. Compute $\mathbf{u} + \mathbf{v}$.

<!--
Answer: $\begin{bmatrix} 6 \\ 8 \end{bmatrix}$
-->

2. Let $\mathbf{u} = \begin{bmatrix} 4 \\ 2 \end{bmatrix}$ and $\mathbf{v} = \begin{bmatrix} 6\\ 2 \end{bmatrix}$. Compute $\mathbf{u} + \mathbf{v}$.

<!--
Answer: $\begin{bmatrix} 10 \\ 4 \end{bmatrix}$
-->


## Matrix Arithmetic

1. Let $A = \begin{bmatrix} 2 & 3 \\ 4 & 5 \end{bmatrix}$ and $B = \begin{bmatrix} 6 & 7 \\ 8 & 9 \end{bmatrix}$. Compute $A + B$.

<!--
Answer: $\begin{bmatrix} 8 & 10 \\ 12 & 14 \end{bmatrix}$
-->

2. Let $A = \begin{bmatrix} 4 & 2 \\ 4 & 5 \end{bmatrix}$ and $B = \begin{bmatrix} 2 & 1 \\ 8 & 2 \end{bmatrix}$. Compute $A - B$.

<!--
Answer: $\begin{bmatrix} 2 & 1 \\ -4 & 3 \end{bmatrix}$
-->

3. Let $A = \begin{bmatrix} 2 & 3 \\ 4 & 5 \end{bmatrix}$ and $B = \begin{bmatrix} 6 & 7 \\ 8 & 9 \end{bmatrix}$. Compute $A \cdot B$.

<!--
Answer: $\begin{bmatrix} 36 & 41 \\ 64 & 73 \end{bmatrix}$
-->

4. Let $A = \begin{bmatrix} 2 & 5 \\ 2 & 5 \end{bmatrix}$ and $B = \begin{bmatrix} 2 & 1 \\ 4 & 2 \end{bmatrix}$. Compute $A \times B$.

<!--
Answer: $\begin{bmatrix} 18 & 9 \\ 18 & 9 \end{bmatrix}$
-->

5. Let $A = \begin{bmatrix} 2 & 3 \\ 4 & 5 \end{bmatrix}$ and $B = \begin{bmatrix} 6 & 7 \\ 8 & 9 \end{bmatrix}$. Compute $A \cdot B$.

<!--
Answer: $\begin{bmatrix} 36 & 41 \\ 64 & 73 \end{bmatrix}$
-->

## Gaussian Elimination

1. Solve the following system of equations using Gaussian elimination:

$$
\begin{align*}
2x + 3y &= 8 \\
4x + 5y &= 18
\end{align*}
$$

<!--
Answer: $x = 2, y = 2$
-->

2. Solve the following system of equations using Gaussian elimination:

$$
\begin{align*}
3x + 2y &= 11 \\
5x + 3y &= 16
\end{align*}
$$

<!--
Answer: $x = 2, y = 3$
-->

3. Solve the following system of equations using Gaussian elimination:

$$
\begin{align*}
2x + 3y + z &= 8 \\
4x + 5y + z &= 18 \\
x + 2y + z &= 7
\end{align*}
$$

<!--
Answer: $x = 1, y = 2, z = 3$
-->

4. Solve the following system of equations using Gaussian elimination:

$$
\begin{align*}
2x + 3y + z &= 8 \\
4x + 5y + z &= 18 \\
3x + 4y + z &= 13
\end{align*}
$$

<!--
Answer: $x = 1, y = 2, z = 3$
-->

5. Solve the following system of equations using Gaussian elimination:

$$
\begin{align*}
2x + 3y + z &= 8 \\
4x + 5y + z &= 18 \\
x + 2y + z &= 7
\end{align*}
$$

<!--
Answer: $x = 1, y = 2, z = 3$
-->

4. Choose the correct answer.

$$
\begin{align*}
2x + 3y &= 8 \\
4x + 5y &= 18
\end{align*}
$$

a) $x = 2, y = 2$

b) $x = 3, y = 2$

c) $x = 2, y = 3$

d) $x = 3, y = 3$

<!--
Answer: a) $x = 2, y = 2$
-->
